description.displayText: Charlene cared for both my sons ages 2 and 5.  She was always early and never called out.  She always did my older sons homework with him after school and made sure the house was spotless before I came home.  Working 40+ hours a week, that was more then greatly appreciated.  If I forgot to do something she always took care of it.  It was piece of mind for me, having her there.
description.originalText: Charlene cared for both my sons ages 2 and 5.  She was always early and never called out.  She always did my older sons homework with him after school and made sure the house was spotless before I came home.  Working 40+ hours a week, that was more then greatly appreciated.  If I forgot to do something she always took care of it.  It was piece of mind for me, having her there.

description.displayText: Charlene is a reliable, trustworthy, caring nanny. She became more than a sitter, and a friend and we still keep in touch. She goes above a job description and bonds w her kids. I'd recommend her to any family. You'll have no worries with Charlene taking care of your children!
description.originalText: Charlene is a reliable, trustworthy, caring nanny. She became more than a sitter, and a friend and we still keep in touch. She goes above a job description and bonds w her kids. I'd recommend her to any family. You'll have no worries with Charlene taking care of your children!

description.displayText: Charlene worked for me for about 8 months and I loved her.  The kids really loved her and she treated them like family.  She left only because I lost my job in October.  I am hoping to use her again when I get another job.  She was always on time and has a great personality to deal with.  If anyone would like a reference check, I would be more then happy to speak with you.

description.displayText: Charlene has cared for my 16 month old and 4 year old a handful of times. She always arrives ahead of time. My daughter likes her.  Charlene is also an excellent cook!
description.originalText: Charlene has cared for my 16 month old and 4 year old a handful of times. She always arrives ahead of time. My daughter likes her.  Charlene is also an excellent cook!

description.displayText: Charlene worked for me briefly watching my child and housekeeping.  My child took to her immediately.  Charlene is loyal, meticulous, and easy to talk to.  I unfortunately had to let her go due to a change in my job hours. I wish her the best.
